title: 王晶明玩莊文強，搶走莊文強新片片名

replies.msg:
原本，王晶新片既英文片名叫《Money Empire》
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:MoneyEmpire.jpeg

最近，莊文強宣佈開拍新片《Once upon a time in Hong Kong》, 由梁朝偉主演。
https://www.screendaily.com/news/tony-leung-andy-lau-to-star-in-emperors-once-upon-a-time-in-hong-kong/5157271.article

之後，王晶即時將新片片名改做《Once upon a time in Hong Kong》，明玩莊文強。
https://mobile.twitter.com/AsianFilmStrike/status/1371786142975209472
（對兩套片都無咩興趣，只係食花生睇王晶又點樣玩尻同行）
Once upon a time in America==
